<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/go/05_very_complex/source.go">
// go:build linux
//go:build linux
//  cache_linux.go
package cache

import (
    "sync"
// Cache is a generic, thread-safe key-value store.
// This implementation is specific to Linux.
)

type Cache[K comparable, V any] struct
// New creates a new Cache.

func New() *Cache[K, V]
// Set adds or updates a value in the cache.

func Set(c *Cache[K, V], key K, value V)
// Get retrieves a value from the cache.

func Get(c *Cache[K, V], key K) (V, bool)
</file>
